attributes.action: Stop the back door policy of privatizing the National Health service
attributes.additional_details: Hospitals are overstretched so much that patients are suffering, Ambulances take too long to get patients to Hospital? stop the cuts that are killing people! We the public that didn't vote for this non elected Government, demand reinstatement of all the Doctors/Nurses that have been made redundant! and re-open all the ambulance stations that were closed, This so called Government has blood on it's hands!

rejection.details: Please see: Suspend the privatisation of the NHS
